AzureBlade remained unmoved and calm.

AzureBlade: Are you finished ranting now?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras:
> 
> Hydras eye's shone in rage "Are you telleing me that I have to work 
> with MAximas...?? I NEVER WILL WORK TOGEHTER THEM!!!!! AND FOR YOU 
> KNOWLEGE, I'LL FOLLOW MY CURRENTS GOALS: DESTROY MAXIMALS AND DO 
> THAT PREDA AND DECEPTICONS RULES THE UNIVERSE!!!!!!"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > The ice dragon managed a small smile.
> > 
> > AzureBlade: Then we agree. I have asked the assistance of the
> > Maximals, and they have also offered it. By the way...
> > 
> > He crossed his arms, partly in defiance, and partly to make the
> > predacon leader know he had some authority.
> > 
> > AzureBlade: You must know that the Survivor Council is unanimous on
> > your case; you are a renegade and as long as you pursue your 
> current
> > activities, you could be the subject of any "cleaning" actions that
> > could be undertaken.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Hydras:
> > > 
> > > "My assistance??? did you know that my real objective it destroy 
> > > him???? As Galvatron and Megatrons, that IS my objective!!!! if 
> you 
> > > wish Kill him count with my help... "
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > > AzureBlade remainded standing.
> > > > 
> > > > AzureBlade: I come straight from Earth, where both Predacons 
> and
> > > > Maximals have taken refuge after the Tripredacus invasion of
> > > > Cybertron. The survivors have now formed a Council and have 
> decreed
> > > > that all Maximals and Predacons must at least cooperate at 
> > > resisting
> > > > the Tripredacus. My specific target is the Dark Optimus Prime. 
> > > This is
> > > > why I come for your assistance. Prime is powerful and I need 
> > > allies in
> > > > this endeavour.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airshadow Nightstar" 
> > > <airly2002@h...>
> > > > wrote:
> > > > >
